desc_first_part: Passionate about web development, I passed a title professional Web / Mobile Developer at POP School, I like to experiment, discover and learn new technologies, these are the reasons why I completed this training.
desc_second_part: Creative, rigorous and with excellent know-how, I have a good knowledge of several web programming languages, I really like this job and I like to update my knowledge. Wishing to invest myself in a position that corresponds to my aspirations, I would like to be able to explain my motivations to you during an interview
